short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opt-in to allow developers to programmatically close the tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By installing this extension you opt-in for a developer to close the tab programmatically. 

This is specially useful in enterprise environments where closing the tab must be done for security purposes. For example closing the tab after the user logs out.
